Class ArchiveServerRequestData

java.lang.Object
com.laoluade.ingestor.ao3.models.ArchiveServerRequestData
public class ArchiveServerRequestData extends Object

This class defines the POJO model for POST request data for the Archive Server.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private int
    maxBookmarkPageLimit
    This attribute holds the client's maximum bookmark page limit.
    private int
    maxCommentPageLimit
    This attribute holds the client's maximum comment page limit.
    private int
    maxCommentThreadDepth
    This attribute holds the client's maximum comment thread depth.
    private int
    maxKudosPageLimit
    This attribute holds the client's maximum kudos page limit.
    private boolean
    nicknameSent
    This attribute describes whether a session nickname was sent in the request.
    private String
    pageLink
    This attribute holds the page link the client wants to parse.
    private String
    sessionNickname
    This attribute holds the client's nickname for the session.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ArchiveServerRequestData(String pageLink)
    This constructor creates a standardized request object with only a page link.
    ArchiveServerRequestData(String pageLink, int maxCommentThreadDepth, int maxCommentPageLimit, int maxKudosPageLimit, int maxBookmarkPageLimit)
    This constructor creates a standardized request object with all parameters except the session nickname.
    ArchiveServerRequestData(String pageLink, String sessionNickname)
    This constructor creates a standardized request object with only a page link and session nickname.
    ArchiveServerRequestData(String pageLink, String sessionNickname, int maxCommentThreadDepth, int maxCommentPageLimit, int maxKudosPageLimit, int maxBookmarkPageLimit)
    This constructor creates a standardized request object with all parameters.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createNicknameTest(String sessionNickname)
    This method validates that a session nickname uses only alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens.
    void
    createURLTest(String pageLink)
    This method validates that a page link's pattern lines up with an AO3 work/chapter and that it can be turned into a URL.
    void
    setPageLink(String pageLink)
    This method is a setter for the pageLink attribute.
    void
    setSessionNickname(String sessionNickname)
    This method is a setter for the sessionNickname attribute.

  • Constructor Details

    • ArchiveServerRequestData

      public ArchiveServerRequestData(String pageLink)

      This constructor creates a standardized request object with only a page link.

      Parameters:
      pageLink - The page link the client wants to parse.

    • ArchiveServerRequestData

      public ArchiveServerRequestData(String pageLink, String sessionNickname)

      This constructor creates a standardized request object with only a page link and session nickname.

      Parameters:
      pageLink - The page link the client wants to parse.
      sessionNickname - The client's nickname for the session.

    • ArchiveServerRequestData

      public ArchiveServerRequestData(String pageLink, int maxCommentThreadDepth, int maxCommentPageLimit, int maxKudosPageLimit, int maxBookmarkPageLimit)

      This constructor creates a standardized request object with all parameters except the session nickname.

      Parameters:
      pageLink - The page link the client wants to parse.
      maxCommentThreadDepth - The client's maximum comment thread depth.
      maxCommentPageLimit - The client's maximum comment page limit.
      maxKudosPageLimit - The client's maximum kudos page limit.
      maxBookmarkPageLimit - The client's maximum bookmark page limit.

    • ArchiveServerRequestData

      public ArchiveServerRequestData(String pageLink, String sessionNickname, int maxCommentThreadDepth, int maxCommentPageLimit, int maxKudosPageLimit, int maxBookmarkPageLimit)

      This constructor creates a standardized request object with all parameters.

      Parameters:
      pageLink - The page link the client wants to parse.
      sessionNickname - The client's nickname for the session.
      maxCommentThreadDepth - The client's maximum comment thread depth.
      maxCommentPageLimit - The client's maximum comment page limit.
      maxKudosPageLimit - The client's maximum kudos page limit.
      maxBookmarkPageLimit - The client's maximum bookmark page limit.

    • createURLTest

      public void createURLTest(String pageLink)

      This method validates that a page link's pattern lines up with an AO3 work/chapter and that it can be turned into a URL.

      Parameters:
      pageLink - The page link the client wants to parse.

    • createNicknameTest

      public void createNicknameTest(String sessionNickname)

      This method validates that a session nickname uses only alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens.

      Parameters:
      sessionNickname - The client's nickname for the session.
